quotes.quote: The world is round; it has no point.
quotes.author: Adrienne E. Gusoff

quotes.quote: I think the world is run by 'C' students.
quotes.author: Al McGuire

quotes.quote: The most incomprehensible thing about the world is that it is at all comprehensible.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: In the fight between you and the world, back the world.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: The world's as ugly as sin, and almost as delightful
quotes.author: Frederick Locker-Lampson

quotes.quote: The world is a tragedy to those who feel, but a comedy to those who think.
quotes.author: Horace Walpole

quotes.quote: Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: All the world's a stage and most of us are desperately unrehearsed.
quotes.author: Sean O'Casey
